item.description:
Come celebrate the 200th birthday of Charles Darwin. It will be a belated celebration, as his birthday is February 12th, but it will be a celebration none the less. There will be a cake and a brief video about the life of Charles Darwin.

A third to a half of the people in the US do not believe in evolution. So lets get together and celebrate the birth of the man who proved the book of Genesis to be false.

Come down to catch up with local non-believers, meet some new people, have a few drinks, celebrate Darwin Day, and have some cake.
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the private function room.
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society Darwin's Birthday Celebration
